records.location_details: Shooting incident at Evros river, close to the Turkish bank, involving Turkish Gendarmerie patrol.
records.country_or_area: Evros river (border between Greece and Turkey)
records.context_note: On the 28th of April at 19.45, an officer patrolling close to Evros river reported a shooting incident by a Turkish Gendarmerie patrol. A gunshot was heard from the opposite side of the river at 19:30. At 19:35, a Turkish patrol boat with six soldiers arrived at a landing stage, while another boat with three soldiers was leaving. The incident was reported to superiors, and the patrol remained in the area until tension de-escalated. No one was injured.
records.evidence_quote: Shooting incident at Evros river... reported a shooting incident by Turkish Gendarmerie patrol that was patrolling in a close distance at the Turkish bank of the river. ...Nobody has been injured.
